job.name: Incremental_Monte_Carlo_VaR_Each_Portfolio_Asset

variable.name: nbMC
variable.description: The number of Monte Carlo simulations per VaR estimation.

variable.name: nbTimeSteps
variable.description: The number of time steps to the horizon.

variable.name: assets_params_file_path_from_dataspace
variable.description: The relative path from the dataspace of the asset params file following the csv format.

variable.name: assets_correlations_file_path_from_dataspace
variable.description: The relative path from the dataspace of the asset correlations file.

variable.name: nbBins
variable.description: The number of bins for the portfolio estimation distributions.

variable.name: nbTasksPerVaR
variable.description: The number of ProActive replicated tasks per VaR estimation.

variable.name: width_chart
variable.description: The width of the chart in pixels.

variable.name: height_chart
variable.description: The height of the chart in pixels.

job.description: Estimates the incremental VaR (iVaR) for each asset of the portfolio. iVaR quantifies the risk a position (or sub-portfolio) is adding to a portfolio. For instance, the iVaR related to an asset Y, is the difference between the portfolio VaR with and without Y.

metadata.visualization:
split_MC_simulations  
 Submit_Monte_Carlo_VaR_Portfolio  
 empty  
 Submit_Monte_Carlo_VaRs_Portfolio  
 process_iVaRs  
replicate
